Question.Subject: best burger chain in the Chicago area?
Question.Content: which is the best burger chain in the chicago metro area like for example burger king portillos white castle which one do like the best?

ChosenAnswer: Red Robin. Onion Rings are great and the fries are endless. Fudruckers.

Answers.Answer:
Chain? Does 5 make a chain?
Hackney's has a great burger formula that started about 80 years ago. There are currently 5 locations:
http://www.hackneys.net/
The latest spot for a real Hackney's is Printers' Row:
http://www.hackneysprintersrow.net/
See what DD&D showed at the original place on Harms Rd in Glenview:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q2lDF0XU3NI
Along with the great burger try a brick of onion rings if you are with someone. Otherwise a 1/2 brick will be fine:
